title: The Paths We Pick Together: A Behavioral Dynamics Algorithm for an HRI Pick-and-Place Task
venue: IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction
excerpt: This paper examines team performance in a dyadic HRI pick-and-place task where the robot is controlled using a dynamics based steering model
citation: Lamb, M., Mayr, R., Lorenz, T., Minai, A., Richardson, MJ. (2018). "The Paths We Pick Together: A Behavioral Dynamics Algorithm for an HRI Pick-and-Place Task" IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction.

title: How Much for Joint Action? Assessing the Cost of Working Together
venue: Proceedings from the International Conference on Perception and Action
excerpt: This paper examines the energy expenditure differences in solo and dyadic tasks
citation: Mayr, R., Davis, T., Riley, MA., Lorenz, T. (2019) "How Much For Joint Action? Assessing the Cost of Working Together" Proceedings from the International Conference on Perception and Action.

title: How Much for Joint Action? Assessing the Cost of Working Together
excerpt: This paper discusses energy expenditure during solo and dyadic tasks
citation: Mayr, R. (2019). "How Much for Joint Action? Assessing the Cost of Working Together." OhioLink.

title: Grasping Embodiment: Haptic Feedback for Artificial Limbs
excerpt: This paper examines the use of vibrotactile motors placed on the arm to investigate alternative haptic feedback modalities for future use in prostheses
citation: Moore, C., Corbin, S., Mayr, R., Shockley, K., Silva, P., Lorenz, T. (2021). "Grasping Embodiment: Haptic Feedback for Artificial Limbs." Frontiers in Neurorobotics.
